translated: There is no application to what is unrelated.

original: ji ltar 'chad pa po dang nyan pa po dang 'brel pa can gyi ming la sogs pa'i brjod par bya ba yin no //üîΩdon la 'jug pa med pa de ltar 'chad pa po dang nyan pa po'i brjod par bya ba'i don dang 'brel pa med pa can gyi ming la sogs pa 'ga' zhig la yang rten pa med pa rang dbang du 'gyur ba brjod pa na /
analyzed: ji ltar 'chad pa po dang nyan pa po dang 'brel pa can gyi ming la sogs pa'i brjod par bya ba yin no // don la 'jug pa med pa de ltar 'chad pa po dang nyan pa po'i brjod par bya ba'i don dang 'brel pa med pa can gyi ming la sogs pa 'ga' zhig la yang rten pa med pa rang dbang du 'gyur ba brjod pa na /
translated: As for the object that is related to the speaker and the listener, it is the referent of such expressions as ‚Äúname‚Äù and so on.

original: don byed par rung ba'i don la 'jug pa med pa yin no zhes bstan to //
analyzed: don byed par rung ba'i don la 'jug pa med pa yin no zhes bstan to //
translated: When one speaks of something that is not related to the referent of the expression of the speaker and the listener, something that is not based on anything, something that is independent, then there is no application of a word to an object that is capable of performing a function.üîΩThis is what is being taught.

original: gal te don dang 'brel ldan yin //
analyzed: gal te don dang 'brel ldan yin //
translated: If it is related to an object,

original: gal te ming la sogs pa'i brjod par bya ba'i don dang 'brel pa dang ldan par 'dod pa de'i tshe /
analyzed: gal te ming la sogs pa'i brjod par bya ba'i don dang 'brel pa dang ldan par 'dod pa de'i tshe /
translated: if you accept that the referent of the expression ‚Äúname‚Äù and so on is related to an object,

original: 'das dang ma 'ongs brjod bya min //
analyzed: 'das dang ma 'ongs brjod bya min //
translated: then the past and future are not referents.

original: 'das pa la sogs pa'i sgra'am /
analyzed: 'das pa la sogs pa'i sgra'am /
translated: The words ‚Äúpast‚Äù and so on

original: 'das pa la sogs pa'i don rjod par byed pa gzhan gyis brjod par bya bar 'gyur ba ma yin te /
analyzed: 'das pa la sogs pa'i don rjod par byed pa gzhan gyis brjod par bya bar 'gyur ba ma yin te /
translated: The past, etc., are not expressed by other words,

original: dper na rgyal po chen po mang pos bkur ba byung bar gyur pa dang / rgyal po dung 'khor los sgyur bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba lta bu'o //
analyzed: dper na rgyal po chen po mang pos bkur ba byung bar gyur pa dang / rgyal po dung 'khor los sgyur bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba lta bu'o //
translated: for example, ‚ÄúThe great king MahƒÅsa·πÉmata arose‚Äù and ‚ÄúThe king ≈öa·πÖkha will be a cakravartin.‚Äù

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: don dang de dag zad phyir ro //
analyzed: don dang de dag zad phyir ro //
translated: Because the object and its exhaustion.

original: brjod par bya ba'i don byed pa'i dngos po gang yin pa de dang lhan cig de la brten pa'i ming dang mtshan ma dag kyang zhig pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: brjod par bya ba'i don byed pa'i dngos po gang yin pa de dang lhan cig de la brten pa'i ming dang mtshan ma dag kyang zhig pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The object that is the basis of expression and the thing that is its cause are destroyed, and the name and the sign that are based on them are also destroyed.

original: ma 'ongs pa @132a * //
analyzed: ma 'ongs pa @132a * //
translated: The future

original: yang ma skyes pas na de rten nyid ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: yang ma skyes pas na de rten nyid ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: is not a basis because it has not yet arisen.

original: ci ste yang brjod bya zhig pa 'am ma skyes pa yin na yang ming la sogs pa rang rgyud 'ba' zhig tu gnas pa nyid yin no zhe na /
analyzed: ci ste yang brjod bya zhig pa 'am ma skyes pa yin na yang ming la sogs pa rang rgyud 'ba' zhig tu gnas pa nyid yin no zhe na /
translated: But if the object to be expressed, even though it is destroyed or has not yet arisen, the name, etc., remain in a mere continuum,

original: de'i tshe de ni brten pa nyid ma yin pa'i phyir /
analyzed: de'i tshe de ni brten pa nyid ma yin pa'i phyir /
translated: then at that time, because it is not a basis,

original: 'brel pa med pa'i phyogs la 'byung ba can gyi skyon la brten par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'brel pa med pa'i phyogs la 'byung ba can gyi skyon la brten par 'gyur ro //
translated: and the fault of the non-relation of the subject to the reason.

original: de ltar 'gyur mod kyi /
analyzed: de ltar 'gyur mod kyi /
translated: Granted, this is so.

original: sgra yis spyi ni brjod pa'i phyir //
analyzed: sgra yis spyi ni brjod pa'i phyir //
translated: But the word expresses the universal.

original: gal te thal ba mi 'dod na //
analyzed: gal te thal ba mi 'dod na //
translated: If you do not accept the absurd conclusion,

original: gzugs la sogs pa sgra'i brjod par bya ba nyid yin na /
analyzed: gzugs la sogs pa sgra'i brjod par bya ba nyid yin na /
translated: then the word expresses form, etc.

original: dbang po'i tshogs 'bras bu med par 'gyur ro zhes bshad pa gang yin pa'i thal ba 'di nyid yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: dbang po'i tshogs 'bras bu med par 'gyur ro zhes bshad pa gang yin pa'i thal ba 'di nyid yod pa ma yin no //
translated: The absurd conclusion that the collection of sense faculties would be fruitless does not apply,

original: 'di ltar gzugs la sogs pa'i don sgra las nges pa ma yin no //
analyzed: 'di ltar gzugs la sogs pa'i don sgra las nges pa ma yin no //
translated: because the word does not ascertain the object, form, etc.

original: 'o na ci yin zhe na /
analyzed: 'o na ci yin zhe na /
translated: What then does it ascertain?

original: spyi yin no /
analyzed: spyi yin no /
translated: The universal.

original: de bas na gzugs la sogs pa'i shes pa la dbang po don dang ldan pa nyid yin no //
analyzed: de bas na gzugs la sogs pa'i shes pa la dbang po don dang ldan pa nyid yin no //
translated: Therefore, the sense faculties are not fruitless with regard to the cognition of form, etc.

original: dbang po'i tshogs 'bras bu med par thal ba med par de min no //
analyzed: dbang po'i tshogs 'bras bu med par thal ba med par de min no //
translated: The absurd conclusion that the collection of sense faculties would be fruitless does not apply.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /üîΩspyi ni yan gar ba brjod med phyir ro //
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na / spyi ni yan gar ba brjod med phyir ro //
translated: Why?üîΩBecause the word does not express the universal alone.

original: sgras gsal ba la ltos pa med pa spyi brjod pa med pa de ltar na /
analyzed: sgras gsal ba la ltos pa med pa spyi brjod pa med pa de ltar na /
translated: The word does not express the universal without regard to the particular.

original: khyad par dang bcas pa'i sgo nas spyi shes par byed pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: khyad par dang bcas pa'i sgo nas spyi shes par byed pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because the universal is cognized through the particular.

original: khyad par gyi gzhi yang rtogs pa'i phyir /
analyzed: khyad par gyi gzhi yang rtogs pa'i phyir /
translated: And because the substratum of the particular is also cognized,

original: dbang po'i tshogs don med pa nyid yin no //
analyzed: dbang po'i tshogs don med pa nyid yin no //
translated: the collection of sense faculties would be meaningless.

original: brjod na yang gsal ba la ltos pa med pa spyi yan gar ba yang sgras brjod par bya bar khas len na'o //
analyzed: brjod na yang gsal ba la ltos pa med pa spyi yan gar ba yang sgras brjod par bya bar khas len na'o //
translated: If you say that the universal is expressed by words, then you are accepting that the bare universal alone is expressed by words, without depending on the particulars.

original: de mtshungs min dang gsal ba min //
analyzed: de mtshungs min dang gsal ba min //
translated: It is not similar to that, nor is it a particular.

original: gsal ba ni gsal bar byed pa ste /
analyzed: gsal ba ni gsal bar byed pa ste /
translated: The particular is that which makes something manifest.

original: spyi yan gar ba sgras brjod pa yin na /üîΩgsal ba'i spyi der mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: spyi yan gar ba sgras brjod pa yin na / gsal ba'i spyi der mi 'gyur ro //
translated: If the bare universal is expressed by words,üîΩthen the universal of the particular would not be that.

original: gsal bas gsal bar bya ba nyid kyang 'di la yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: gsal bas gsal bar bya ba nyid kyang 'di la yod pa ma yin no //
translated: And it is not the case that the particular makes that manifest.

original: de bas na /
analyzed: de bas na /
translated: Therefore,

original: de mtshungs min dang gsal ba min //
analyzed: de mtshungs min dang gsal ba min //
translated: it is not similar to that, nor is it a particular.

original: de bas na spyi ni de dang mtshungs pa nyid ma yin zhing gsal ba ma yin pa de dag tu 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de bas na spyi ni de dang mtshungs pa nyid ma yin zhing gsal ba ma yin pa de dag tu 'gyur ro //
translated: Therefore, the universal is not similar to that, nor is it a particular.

original: de ltar na dngos su de ni 'di'i zhes bya ba'i 'brel pa ni /
analyzed: de ltar na dngos su de ni 'di'i zhes bya ba'i 'brel pa ni /
translated: Thus, the direct connection of ‚Äúthis is that‚Äù

original: gang zhig gang la skye ba'i gzhan gyi dbang la rag las pa'am /
analyzed: gang zhig gang la skye ba'i gzhan gyi dbang la rag las pa'am /
translated: It is dependent on the other, the causal process, in that it arises in dependence on that.üîΩ

original: de'i sgo nas rtogs pa'i gzhan gyi dbang ste /
analyzed: de'i sgo nas rtogs pa'i gzhan gyi dbang ste /
translated: It is dependent on another in that it arises from another, or it is dependent on another in that it is understood through another.

original: gang gi bdag nyid rtogs par 'gyur ba yin grang na /üîΩre zhig spyi ni gsal ba la skye ba'i gzhan gyi dbang nyid ma yin te /
analyzed: gang gi bdag nyid rtogs par 'gyur ba yin grang na / re zhig spyi ni gsal ba la skye ba'i gzhan gyi dbang nyid ma yin te /
translated: But what is the nature of that which is to be understood?

original: rtag pa nyid kyi phyir ro //üîΩrtogs pa'i gzhan gyi dbang yang ma yin te /
analyzed: rtag pa nyid kyi phyir ro // rtogs pa'i gzhan gyi dbang yang ma yin te /
translated: First, a universal is not dependent on another in that it arises from another, because it is permanent.

original: gsal ba la @132b ltos pa med par sgras brjod par khas len pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gsal ba la @132b ltos pa med par sgras brjod par khas len pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Nor is it dependent on another in that it is understood, because it is accepted that it is expressed by a word without depending on an individual.

original: de ltar na gsal ba ni de dang mtshungs pa ma yin no //üîΩgsal bas gsal bar bya ba yang ma yin te /
analyzed: de ltar na gsal ba ni de dang mtshungs pa ma yin no // gsal bas gsal bar bya ba yang ma yin te /
translated: Thus, an individual is not similar to it.

original: gsal ba la ltos pa med par sgras brjod par bya ba nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gsal ba la ltos pa med par sgras brjod par bya ba nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Nor is an individual something that is made manifest by an individual, because it is accepted that it is expressed by a word without depending on an individual.

original: sbyor ba ni gang zhig gang la skye ba dang rtogs pa'i gzhan gyi dbang nyid ma yin pa de ni /
analyzed: sbyor ba ni gang zhig gang la skye ba dang rtogs pa'i gzhan gyi dbang nyid ma yin pa de ni /
translated: The syllogism is: Whatever is not dependent on another in that it arises or is understood,

original: de'i zhes bya ba'am de la zhes bya bar dngos su tha snyad gdags par 'os pa ma yin te /
analyzed: de'i zhes bya ba'am de la zhes bya bar dngos su tha snyad gdags par 'os pa ma yin te /
translated: It is not suitable to be the referent of the term ‚Äúthat‚Äù or ‚Äúin that,‚Äù

original: dper na gangs can dang 'bigs byed lta bu'o //
analyzed: dper na gangs can dang 'bigs byed lta bu'o //
translated: like the Himalayas or Vindhya mountains.üîΩThe mere nature of the apprehended universal and that permanent thing are not dependent on other things that arise and are cognized,

original: spyi gzung bar bya ba'i rang gi ngo bo 'ba' zhig dang rtag pa de yang skye ba dang rtogs pa gzhan gyi dbang gis gsal ba gzhan gyi dbang ma yin no zhes bya ba ni khyab par byed pa mi dmigs pa'o //
analyzed: spyi gzung bar bya ba'i rang gi ngo bo 'ba' zhig dang rtag pa de yang skye ba dang rtogs pa gzhan gyi dbang gis gsal ba gzhan gyi dbang ma yin no zhes bya ba ni khyab par byed pa mi dmigs pa'o //
translated: this is a nonobservation of a pervader.

original: gang zhig gang la ltos pa med par rang dbang can blos gzung ba de ni des gsal bar bya ba ma yin te /
analyzed: gang zhig gang la ltos pa med par rang dbang can blos gzung ba de ni des gsal bar bya ba ma yin te /
translated: Whatever is apprehended by an independent mind that does not depend on anything else is not clarified by that,

original: dper na snang ba la ltos pa med par rang dbang can sgras rjod par byed ba lta bu'o //
analyzed: dper na snang ba la ltos pa med par rang dbang can sgras rjod par byed ba lta bu'o //
translated: like sound, which is apprehended by an independent mind that does not depend on light.üîΩThe universal is apprehended by an independent mind that does not depend on the particulars,

original: spyi yang gsal ba la ltos pa med par rang dbang can blos gzung bar bya ba yin no zhes bya ba ni khyab par byed pa mi dmigs pa'o //
analyzed: spyi yang gsal ba la ltos pa med par rang dbang can blos gzung bar bya ba yin no zhes bya ba ni khyab par byed pa mi dmigs pa'o //
translated: this is a nonobservation of a pervader.

original: de ltar na gsal ba ltos pa med par rang dbang can brjod par bya ba yin gyi /
analyzed: de ltar na gsal ba ltos pa med par rang dbang can brjod par bya ba yin gyi /
translated: Thus, the manifestation is said to be independent, not relying on anything else.

original: gsal bas bya ba than pa la ltos pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: gsal bas bya ba than pa la ltos pa ni ma yin no //
translated: But the manifestation does not rely on the action of manifestation in order to manifest.

original: rgyu des na rtag tu dmigs 'gyur te /
analyzed: rgyu des na rtag tu dmigs 'gyur te /
translated: For that reason, it would always be perceived,

original: gsal ba yod pa dang med pa nyid kyi dus na yang spyi dmigs par 'gyur te /
analyzed: gsal ba yod pa dang med pa nyid kyi dus na yang spyi dmigs par 'gyur te /
translated: because even when the manifestation exists or does not exist, the universal would be perceived,

original: rtag nyid phyir ro //
analyzed: rtag nyid phyir ro //
translated: because it is permanent.

original: spyi rtag tu snang bar yang 'gyur ba de ltar na gsal ba ma byung ba dang 'jig pa'i dus na yang 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: spyi rtag tu snang bar yang 'gyur ba de ltar na gsal ba ma byung ba dang 'jig pa'i dus na yang 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
translated: And if the universal always appeared, then the manifestation would appear even when it did not arise or was destroyed.

original: sbyor ba ni gang zhig gang gis byas pa'i phan pa la ltos pa med par dmigs pa can de ni yod pa dang med pa nyid kyi dus na yang dmigs par 'gyur te /
analyzed: sbyor ba ni gang zhig gang gis byas pa'i phan pa la ltos pa med par dmigs pa can de ni yod pa dang med pa nyid kyi dus na yang dmigs par 'gyur te /
translated: The syllogism is: Whatever is perceived without relying on the benefit created by something else is perceived even when it does not exist,

original: dper na dmigs par byed pa la snang bas byas pa'i phan pa la ltos pa med pa'i reg bya lta bu'o //
analyzed: dper na dmigs par byed pa la snang bas byas pa'i phan pa la ltos pa med pa'i reg bya lta bu'o //
translated: like the tangible object, which does not rely on the benefit created by the manifestation in order to be perceived.

original: spyi yang gsal bas byas pa'i phan pa la ltos pa med par dmigs par byed pa can yin no zhes bya ba ni rang bzhin gyi gtan tshigs so //
analyzed: spyi yang gsal bas byas pa'i phan pa la ltos pa med par dmigs par byed pa can yin no zhes bya ba ni rang bzhin gyi gtan tshigs so //
translated: The reason is natural.

original: gang zhig gang dmigs pa'i mtshan nyid kyir gyur pa yod pa de ni de'i tshe dmigs par 'gyur te /
analyzed: gang zhig gang dmigs pa'i mtshan nyid kyir gyur pa yod pa de ni de'i tshe dmigs par 'gyur te /
translated: That which is the object of the perception of a universal is perceived at that time,

original: dper na dbugs kyi gnas skabs kyi spyi de nyid lta bu'o //üîΩspyi la yang gnas @133a * //
analyzed: dper na dbugs kyi gnas skabs kyi spyi de nyid lta bu'o // spyi la yang gnas @133a * //
translated: like the universal of the state of breathing.üîΩAnd the universal is the object of the perception of the prior and subsequent states.

original: skabs snga phyi dag tu dmigs pa'i mtshan nyid kyi gyur pa yin no zhes bya ba ni rang bzhin gyi gtan tshigs so //üîΩde ltar ni 'gyur mod kyi /
analyzed: skabs snga phyi dag tu dmigs pa'i mtshan nyid kyi gyur pa yin no zhes bya ba ni rang bzhin gyi gtan tshigs so // de ltar ni 'gyur mod kyi /
translated: The reason is natural.üîΩThis is true, but

original: gal te yang /üîΩgsal bas mngon sum phyir gsal yin //
analyzed: gal te yang / gsal bas mngon sum phyir gsal yin //
translated: Moreover,üîΩit is clear because it is directly perceived.üîΩ

original: don gyi ngo bo gsal ba las spyi'i mngon par gsal ba gang yin pa'o//
analyzed: don gyi ngo bo gsal ba las spyi'i mngon par gsal ba gang yin pa'o//
translated: the universal is manifest because of the manifestation of the individual,üîΩthen the manifestation of the universal is from the manifestation of the individual thing.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why?

original: mngon sum phyir te /
analyzed: mngon sum phyir te /
translated: Because of perception.

original: phyi rol gyi don gyi khyad par gyi sgo nas spyi gsal ba mngon sum nyid yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: phyi rol gyi don gyi khyad par gyi sgo nas spyi gsal ba mngon sum nyid yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning of the statement ‚ÄúThe universal is directly perceived by means of the particulars of external objects‚Äù is as follows.

original: de bas na gsal ba ma byung ba dang 'jig pa'i dus na gsal bar byed pa'i gsal ba med pa'i phyir /
analyzed: de bas na gsal ba ma byung ba dang 'jig pa'i dus na gsal bar byed pa'i gsal ba med pa'i phyir /
translated: Therefore, when the particulars do not arise or when they are destroyed, the universal does not exist because the particulars that manifest the universal do not exist.

original: gsal ba ma yin pa dmigs pa'i mtshan nyid kyir gyur pa med pa nyid kyis gtan tshigs ma grub pa dag yin no zhe na /
analyzed: gsal ba ma yin pa dmigs pa'i mtshan nyid kyir gyur pa med pa nyid kyis gtan tshigs ma grub pa dag yin no zhe na /
translated: Since the universal is not perceived, the reason is not established because it does not exist.

original: de ltar byas na yang gal te rtag pa nyid kyi phyir dus thams cad du mi dmigs zhes bya ba de tsam gyi skyon gyi lan smras par 'gyur mod kyi /
analyzed: de ltar byas na yang gal te rtag pa nyid kyi phyir dus thams cad du mi dmigs zhes bya ba de tsam gyi skyon gyi lan smras par 'gyur mod kyi /
translated: Even if you respond in this way, you would only be responding to the fault that the reason is not established because it is not perceived at all times, since it is permanent.üîΩBut the remaining faults are still present.

original: skyon lhag ma dag ni de'i gnas skabs can nyid yin no 'di la yang ci spyi de rang gi ngo bo nyid kyis mngon sum gyi shes pa skyed par rung ba yin nam /
analyzed: skyon lhag ma dag ni de'i gnas skabs can nyid yin no 'di la yang ci spyi de rang gi ngo bo nyid kyis mngon sum gyi shes pa skyed par rung ba yin nam /
translated: In this regard, is the universal suitable to generate a perception of itself by means of a direct perception?

original: 'on te rung ba ma yin /
analyzed: 'on te rung ba ma yin /
translated: Or is it not suitable?

original: gal te rung ba'i rang gi ngo bo nyid las 'gyur ba med pa'i phyir gnas skabs snga phyi dag la yang de rung ba nyid yin pa de ltar na ma grub pa yin no //
analyzed: gal te rung ba'i rang gi ngo bo nyid las 'gyur ba med pa'i phyir gnas skabs snga phyi dag la yang de rung ba nyid yin pa de ltar na ma grub pa yin no //
translated: Thus, it is not established.

original: de ltar na /üîΩbdag la shes pa skyed pa na //
analyzed: de ltar na / bdag la shes pa skyed pa na //
translated: In that case,üîΩthe capacity to generate cognition in regard to itself

original: nus pa gang de nus nyid yin //
analyzed: nus pa gang de nus nyid yin //
translated: is the very capacity.

original: nus pa de yang nus pa ma yin par mi rung ngo //
analyzed: nus pa de yang nus pa ma yin par mi rung ngo //
translated: And that capacity is not suitable as non-capacity.

original: bdag nyid la shes pa skyed pa'i phyir /
analyzed: bdag nyid la shes pa skyed pa'i phyir /
translated: Because of the generation of cognition in regard to itself,

original: gal te la lar nus med na /
analyzed: gal te la lar nus med na /
translated: if it is without capacity in some cases,

original: gsal ba ma byung ba dang zhig pa'i gnas skabs kyi dus na'o //
analyzed: gsal ba ma byung ba dang zhig pa'i gnas skabs kyi dus na'o //
translated: it is in the state of non-arising of the manifest and in the state of destruction.

original: de ltar yin na ni /
analyzed: de ltar yin na ni /
translated: If that is the case,

original: de ni kun tshe nus med yin //
analyzed: de ni kun tshe nus med yin //
translated: it is without capacity at all times.

original: spyi'o // de'i zhes bya ba la sogs pas de nyid kyi gzhung 'dzugs pa yin no /
analyzed: spyi'o // de'i zhes bya ba la sogs pas de nyid kyi gzhung 'dzugs pa yin no /
translated: In general, he establishes his own position with ‚Äúthat‚Äù and so on.

original: // / tshad ma rnam 'grel gyi 'grel pa /
analyzed: // / tshad ma rnam 'grel gyi 'grel pa /
translated: Commentary on Valid Knowledge

original: bam po nyi shu gsum pa /
analyzed: bam po nyi shu gsum pa /
translated: Book Twenty-Three

original: bdag nyid la shes pa skye ba'i phyir /
analyzed: bdag nyid la shes pa skye ba'i phyir /
translated: Because of the generation of cognition in regard to itself,

original: spyi de'i nus pa'am nus med pa //
analyzed: spyi de'i nus pa'am nus med pa //
translated: that capacity or non-capacity of the universal

original: rang bzhin gyis ni gang gnas nyid nus pa dang nus pa med pa /
analyzed: rang bzhin gyis ni gang gnas nyid nus pa dang nus pa med pa /
translated: If it is by nature that it exists, then it is not possible to eliminate it,

original: de zad bya phyir nus pa gang /
analyzed: de zad bya phyir nus pa gang /
translated: and if it is by nature that it does not exist, then what is the point of eliminating it?

original: de gsal bar bya ba'i phyir nus pa ci zhig yin /
analyzed: de gsal bar bya ba'i phyir nus pa ci zhig yin /
translated: If it is by nature that it exists, then what is the point of manifesting it?

original: rtag pa nyid phyir te /
analyzed: rtag pa nyid phyir te /
translated: Because it is permanent.

original: rgyu'i phyir spyi ni gso min na /üîΩdngos po'i rgyun mi rtag pa la rkyen gzhan dang gzhan nye ba las /
analyzed: rgyu'i phyir spyi ni gso min na / dngos po'i rgyun mi rtag pa la rkyen gzhan dang gzhan nye ba las /
translated: If the universal is not to be eliminated because it is the cause,üîΩthen it is logical to say that in the case of impermanent things, some states are agents and some are not, because of the proximity of other conditions.

original: gnas skabs kha cig ni byed pa po dang byed pa po ma yin no zhes rigs pa yin na de ni spyi rtag @133b pa la rigs pa ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: gnas skabs kha cig ni byed pa po dang byed pa po ma yin no zhes rigs pa yin na de ni spyi rtag @133b pa la rigs pa ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: But it is not logical to say this in the case of a permanent universal.

original: gzhan yang spyi'i rnam par shes pa gang yin pa de gsal ba la ltos pa med pa spyi rtogs pa yin no zhes 'dod na /
analyzed: gzhan yang spyi'i rnam par shes pa gang yin pa de gsal ba la ltos pa med pa spyi rtogs pa yin no zhes 'dod na /
translated: Moreover, if you maintain that the consciousness of a universal does not depend on a manifestation and that it is the realization of a universal,

original: spyi'i rnam par shes pa de la'ang /
analyzed: spyi'i rnam par shes pa de la'ang /
translated: then that consciousness of a universal

original: rjes 'brel te rjes su 'jug pa'o //
analyzed: rjes 'brel te rjes su 'jug pa'o //
translated: is related to it.

original: sngon po la sogs pa'i rnam pa'i cha ni kha dog dag dang dbyibs kyi yan lag du gnas pa'i sngon po la sogs pa'i cha ste /
analyzed: sngon po la sogs pa'i rnam pa'i cha ni kha dog dag dang dbyibs kyi yan lag du gnas pa'i sngon po la sogs pa'i cha ste /
translated: The aspect of blue, etc. is the part of blue, etc. that is present as the color and shape of the sense-object.

original: chos snang ba'o //üîΩspyi'i rnam par shes pa de la snang bar /
analyzed: chos snang ba'o // spyi'i rnam par shes pa de la snang bar /
translated: It is the appearance of the object.üîΩThe universal is to be known as the appearance in that consciousness.

original: rnam par nges pa ste mtshon par bya'o //
analyzed: rnam par nges pa ste mtshon par bya'o //
translated: It is to be known as the appearance in that consciousness.

original: gal te spyi'i rnam par shes pa //üîΩde la gang gis sprul /
analyzed: gal te spyi'i rnam par shes pa // de la gang gis sprul /
translated: If the universal appears in that consciousness,üîΩwhat is it that is manifested?

original: don gang gis gzhag pa yin //
analyzed: don gang gis gzhag pa yin //
translated: What is it that is posited?

original: spyis ni ma yin te /
analyzed: spyis ni ma yin te /
translated: It is not the universal,

original: de'i rnam pa can nyid ma yin no snyam du sams  so //
analyzed: de'i rnam pa can nyid ma yin no snyam du sams  so //
translated: because it does not have the aspect of that.

original: sngon bo la sogs pa'i rnam pa ni spyi ma yin no //
analyzed: sngon bo la sogs pa'i rnam pa ni spyi ma yin no //
translated: The aspect of blue, etc. is not the universal.

original: de ni sngon po la sogs pa'i rnam pa'i sgo nas spyi 'dzin pa'i rnam par shes pa la spyi snang bar rigs pa ma yin no //
analyzed: de ni sngon po la sogs pa'i rnam pa'i sgo nas spyi 'dzin pa'i rnam par shes pa la spyi snang bar rigs pa ma yin no //
translated: It is not reasonable that the universal appears in the consciousness that apprehends the universal through the aspect of blue, etc.

original: sbyor ba ni gang zhig gi rnam pa dang bral ba de ni 'dzin pa na rnam pa der snang ba ma yin te /
analyzed: sbyor ba ni gang zhig gi rnam pa dang bral ba de ni 'dzin pa na rnam pa der snang ba ma yin te /
translated: The syllogism is: Whatever is devoid of the aspect of something, when it is apprehended, does not appear in that aspect,

original: dper na sgra 'dzin pa na dri lta bu'o //
analyzed: dper na sgra 'dzin pa na dri lta bu'o //
translated: like the apprehension of sound, for example.

original: spyi yang sngon po la sogs pa'i rnam pa dang bral ba yin no zhes bya ba ni khyab par byed pa 'gal ba dmigs pa'o //
analyzed: spyi yang sngon po la sogs pa'i rnam pa dang bral ba yin no zhes bya ba ni khyab par byed pa 'gal ba dmigs pa'o //
translated: This is the observation of an inconsistency with a pervader.

original: de ltar ni 'gyur mod kyi /
analyzed: de ltar ni 'gyur mod kyi /
translated: This is true, but

original: gal te mngon sum shes don can //
analyzed: gal te mngon sum shes don can //
translated: if the sense faculties have the purpose of producing a cognition that is a direct perception,

original: phyir na dbang po don med min //
analyzed: phyir na dbang po don med min //
translated: then they are not purposeless.

original: don shes pa yang rnam pa gnyis te /
analyzed: don shes pa yang rnam pa gnyis te /
translated: A cognition of an object is also of two kinds:

original: mngon sum dang mngon sum ma yin pa'o //
analyzed: mngon sum dang mngon sum ma yin pa'o //
translated: a direct perception and an inference.

original: de la mngon sum ma yin pa'i shes pa skyed pa la sgra byed pa yin la /
analyzed: de la mngon sum ma yin pa'i shes pa skyed pa la sgra byed pa yin la /
translated: Sound is the instrument that produces a cognition that is not a direct perception.

original: mngon sum gyi shes pa skyed pa'i 'bras bu can ni dbang po yin pa de ltar na mngon sum gyi shes pa'i 'bras bu can nyid yin pa'i phyir de dag 'bras bu med pa can ma yin no //
analyzed: mngon sum gyi shes pa skyed pa'i 'bras bu can ni dbang po yin pa de ltar na mngon sum gyi shes pa'i 'bras bu can nyid yin pa'i phyir de dag 'bras bu med pa can ma yin no //
translated: The sense faculties are the instrument that produces a cognition that is a direct perception. Thus, because they are the instrument that produces a direct perception, they are not purposeless.

original: ming la sogs pa brjod pa la yang lan 'di nyid yin no //
analyzed: ming la sogs pa brjod pa la yang lan 'di nyid yin no //
translated: This is also the reply to the objection that the expression of names, etc., is purposeless.

original: ngo bo gcig can zhes bya ba la sogs pas lan 'debs par byed de /
analyzed: ngo bo gcig can zhes bya ba la sogs pas lan 'debs par byed de /
translated: He replies with the statement, ‚ÄúThey are not the same in nature,‚Äù etc.

original: sgra la sogs pa'i don so sor nges pa ngo bo gcig pa gsal ba dang mi gsal ba yin pa de ltar na /
analyzed: sgra la sogs pa'i don so sor nges pa ngo bo gcig pa gsal ba dang mi gsal ba yin pa de ltar na /
translated: The object of sound, etc., is ascertained individually. It is of one nature, but is clear and unclear.

original: ngo bo gcig can sgra sogs las /
analyzed: ngo bo gcig can sgra sogs las /
translated: In that case, from sound, etc., which are of one nature,

original: sogs pa smos pas na gzugs dang dri dang ro la sogs pa bzung ngo //üîΩtha dang snang can /
analyzed: sogs pa smos pas na gzugs dang dri dang ro la sogs pa bzung ngo // tha dang snang can /
translated: the word ‚Äúetc.‚Äù includes form, smell, taste, etc.üîΩThe cognition that has the appearance of the object is clear,

original: gsal bar snang ba'i ngang tshul can dang / de las gzhan pa'i blo gang las ma yin no //
analyzed: gsal bar snang ba'i ngang tshul can dang / de las gzhan pa'i blo gang las ma yin no //
translated: and not from any other cognition.

original: phan tshun mi 'dra ba gsal ba dang mi gsal ba'i @134a * //
analyzed: phan tshun mi 'dra ba gsal ba dang mi gsal ba'i @134a * //
translated: The aspect of mutual difference, clear and unclear,

original: rnam pa ni don la yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: rnam pa ni don la yod pa ma yin no //
translated: does not exist in the object.

original: gang gis shes pa la rnam pa gcig gsal bskyed cing /
analyzed: gang gis shes pa la rnam pa gcig gsal bskyed cing /
translated: By what is the single aspect generated as clear in one cognition

original: gzhan la mi gsal ba yin /
analyzed: gzhan la mi gsal ba yin /
translated: and unclear in another?

original: de bas na ngo bo gcig tu 'dod pa gang yin pa'i ngo bo de nyid kyis rang nyid 'dzin pa'i rnam par shes pa la don der snang ba yin no //
analyzed: de bas na ngo bo gcig tu 'dod pa gang yin pa'i ngo bo de nyid kyis rang nyid 'dzin pa'i rnam par shes pa la don der snang ba yin no //
translated: Therefore, by that very nature which is asserted to be of one nature, the object appears as that object in the cognition that apprehends itself.

original: de ltar na don gcig mngon sum dang mngon sum ma yin pa'i khyad par ram /
analyzed: de ltar na don gcig mngon sum dang mngon sum ma yin pa'i khyad par ram /
translated: Thus, there is a difference between the direct perception and non-direct perception of a single object.

original: so sor snang ba'i khyad par yod pa nyid ma yin no //
analyzed: so sor snang ba'i khyad par yod pa nyid ma yin no //
translated: But they are not different in the particular appearance of each.

original: sbyor ba ni gang zhig don gcig pa'i yul can gyi shes pa de dag ni /üîΩmngon sum dang mngon sum ma yin pa'i khyad par dang ldan pa'am /
analyzed: sbyor ba ni gang zhig don gcig pa'i yul can gyi shes pa de dag ni / mngon sum dang mngon sum ma yin pa'i khyad par dang ldan pa'am /
translated: The application is this: those cognitions that have the same objectüîΩare not different in being either direct perception or non-direct perception,

original: tha dad par snang bar 'gyur ba ma yin te /
analyzed: tha dad par snang bar 'gyur ba ma yin te /
translated: or in appearing as different.

original: dper na mig nyams pa med pa can gyis zla ba gcig tu mthong ba'i mig gi rnam par shes pa lta bu'o //
analyzed: dper na mig nyams pa med pa can gyis zla ba gcig tu mthong ba'i mig gi rnam par shes pa lta bu'o //
translated: For example, the visual cognitions of someone with healthy eyes see one moon.üîΩThe cognitions that are conceptual and non-conceptual have the same object.

original: rnam par rtog pa dang rnam par rtog pa med pa'i shes pa de dag gis yul gcig nyid yin par smra bar 'dod pa'i mngon sum dang mngon sum ma yin pa'i shes pa yang don gcig pa'i yul can yin no zhes bya ba ni khyab par byed pa
analyzed: rnam par rtog pa dang rnam par rtog pa med pa'i shes pa de dag gis yul gcig nyid yin par smra bar 'dod pa'i mngon sum dang mngon sum ma yin pa'i shes pa yang don gcig pa'i yul can yin no zhes bya ba ni khyab par byed pa
translated: The cognitions that are direct perception and non-direct perception have the same object.

original: 'gal ba dmigs pa'o //
analyzed: 'gal ba dmigs pa'o //
translated: The pervasion isüîΩthe observation of what is incompatible.

original: rigs 'dir gsal ba las gzhan nam gzhan ma yin par 'gyur grang na /
analyzed: rigs 'dir gsal ba las gzhan nam gzhan ma yin par 'gyur grang na /
translated: Is the manifestation in this type different or non-different from the type?

original: gal te gzhan ma yin pa de'i tshe /
analyzed: gal te gzhan ma yin pa de'i tshe /
translated: If it is not different,

original: rigs ldan rigs ni min //
analyzed: rigs ldan rigs ni min //
translated: then the possessor of the type is not the type.

original: rigs dang ldan pa nyid rigs ma yin no //üîΩci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: rigs dang ldan pa nyid rigs ma yin no // ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: The universal does not belong to the class of universals.üîΩWhy?

original: rgyu gang gis /
analyzed: rgyu gang gis /
translated: Because of the reason

original: gsal ba'i ngo bor gzhan rten med //üîΩspyi ni gsal ba gzhan gyi rjes su 'gro ba'i ngo bo yin zhing /
analyzed: gsal ba'i ngo bor gzhan rten med // spyi ni gsal ba gzhan gyi rjes su 'gro ba'i ngo bo yin zhing /
translated: that the universal does not depend on another particular.üîΩThe universal is the nature of that which pervades other particulars.

original: gsal ba yang thun mong ma yin pa'i ngo bo gang yin pa de ni gzhan rten med pa ste /
analyzed: gsal ba yang thun mong ma yin pa'i ngo bo gang yin pa de ni gzhan rten med pa ste /
translated: And the particular is the nature of that which is not shared in common. It does not depend on another,

original: 'di la rten gzhan yod pa ma yin no zhes bya bar tshig rnam par sbyar ro //
analyzed: 'di la rten gzhan yod pa ma yin no zhes bya bar tshig rnam par sbyar ro //
translated: that is, it does not have another as its basis.

original: gsal ba gzhan la brten pa ma yin pa ste /
analyzed: gsal ba gzhan la brten pa ma yin pa ste /
translated: The universal does not depend on another particular.

original: gsal ba gzhan 'jug pa ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: gsal ba gzhan 'jug pa ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that it does not enter into another particular.

original: de bas na spyi ma yin no //
analyzed: de bas na spyi ma yin no //
translated: Therefore it is not a universal.

original: de ltar ni 'gyur mod kyi /üîΩgal te tha dad par grub na //
analyzed: de ltar ni 'gyur mod kyi / gal te tha dad par grub na //
translated: This is the case, butüîΩif the universal is established as different,

original: gsal ba las rigs gzhan yin no zhe na /
analyzed: gsal ba las rigs gzhan yin no zhe na /
translated: then the universal is different from the particular.

original: de'i tshe gsal ba 'di'i spyi 'di yin no zhes dngos su tha snyad du bya ba ma yin no //
analyzed: de'i tshe gsal ba 'di'i spyi 'di yin no zhes dngos su tha snyad du bya ba ma yin no //
translated: In that case, it is not directly designated as ‚Äúthis universal of this particular.‚Äù

original: de ltar na 'di'i 'di zhes bya ba 'brel ba gzhan cung zad kyang yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: de ltar na 'di'i 'di zhes bya ba 'brel ba gzhan cung zad kyang yod pa ma yin no //
translated: Thus, this ‚Äúthis‚Äù of this has no other connection whatsoever.

original: 'o na ci yin zhe na ltos par brjod pa'o //
analyzed: 'o na ci yin zhe na ltos par brjod pa'o //
translated: What is it? It is said to be dependent.

original: ltos pa yang 'bras bu yin no //
analyzed: ltos pa yang 'bras bu yin no //
translated: And dependence is the effect.

original: rtag pa nyid kyi phyir rigs gsal ba'i 'bras bu ma yin no //
analyzed: rtag pa nyid kyi phyir rigs gsal ba'i 'bras bu ma yin no //
translated: Because it is permanent, it is not the effect of the manifestation of the genus.

original: 'bras bu nyid ma yin pa'i phyir ltos pa @134b med pa can no //
analyzed: 'bras bu nyid ma yin pa'i phyir ltos pa @134b med pa can no //
translated: Because it is not the effect, it is without dependence.

original: ltos pa med pa can 'bral pa yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: ltos pa med pa can 'bral pa yod pa ma yin no //
translated: That which is without dependence does not have separation.

original: sbyor ba ni gang zhig gang gi 'bras bur 'gyur ba ma yin pa de ni de ltos pa dang bcas pa ma yin te /
analyzed: sbyor ba ni gang zhig gang gi 'bras bur 'gyur ba ma yin pa de ni de ltos pa dang bcas pa ma yin te /
translated: The application is this: that which is not the effect of something does not depend on it,

original: dper na 'bigs byed dang gangs can lta bu'o //
analyzed: dper na 'bigs byed dang gangs can lta bu'o //
translated: like the Vindhya and Himalaya mountains.

original: rigs kyang gsal ba'i 'bras bu ma yin no zhes bya ba ni khyad bar byed pa dmigs pa'o //
analyzed: rigs kyang gsal ba'i 'bras bu ma yin no zhes bya ba ni khyad bar byed pa dmigs pa'o //
translated: And the genus is not the effect of the manifestation, this is the observation of the distinction.

original: gang zhig gang la ltos pa med pa de ni de'i zhes don dam pa'i 'brel pa rigs pa ma yin te /
analyzed: gang zhig gang la ltos pa med pa de ni de'i zhes don dam pa'i 'brel pa rigs pa ma yin te /
translated: That which is not dependent on something is not related to it in the ultimate sense,

original: dper na dpe de nyid lta bu'o //
analyzed: dper na dpe de nyid lta bu'o //
translated: like the example itself.

original: rigs kyang rigs dang ldan pa la ltos pa med pa yin no zhes bya ba de khyab par byed pa 'gal ba dmigs pa'o //
analyzed: rigs kyang rigs dang ldan pa la ltos pa med pa yin no zhes bya ba de khyab par byed pa 'gal ba dmigs pa'o //
translated: And the reason is not independent of the property-possessor. This is a reason based on the observation of an incompatible pervasion.

original: gzhan yang re zhig myu gu la sogs pa /
analyzed: gzhan yang re zhig myu gu la sogs pa /
translated: Moreover, a sprout, etc.,

original: sa bon la sogs pa de'i 'bras bu gang yin pa de yang rang gi rgyu las grub pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: sa bon la sogs pa de'i 'bras bu gang yin pa de yang rang gi rgyu las grub pa'i phyir te /
translated: is the effect of a seed, etc., because it is established from its cause.

original: grub pa nyid kyi phyir cung zhig la ltos pa med pa yin no //
analyzed: grub pa nyid kyi phyir cung zhig la ltos pa med pa yin no //
translated: Since it is established, it does not depend on anything.

original: de nyid kyi phyir de la grub pa'i 'og tu sa bon la sogs pa yang cung zad kyang mi byed pa de bas na /
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir de la grub pa'i 'og tu sa bon la sogs pa yang cung zad kyang mi byed pa de bas na /
translated: Therefore, after it is established, the seed, etc., do not do anything at all. Thus,

original: de ni rag las pa med pa yang rang rgyud du gyur pa yin no //
analyzed: de ni rag las pa med pa yang rang rgyud du gyur pa yin no //
translated: it is not dependent, and it becomes a self-sufficient cause.

original: rtog pa yis ni sa bon la sogs pa dang 'brel par byed /
analyzed: rtog pa yis ni sa bon la sogs pa dang 'brel par byed /
translated: Imagination connects the seed, etc.,

original: sa bon la sogs pa'i ljang bu la sogs pa 'di 'bras bu yin no zhes 'brel pa thob par 'gyur gyi /
analyzed: sa bon la sogs pa'i ljang bu la sogs pa 'di 'bras bu yin no zhes 'brel pa thob par 'gyur gyi /
translated: and it connects the sprout, etc., with the seed, etc., thinking, ‚ÄúThis is the effect of that.‚Äù

original: don dam par 'brel pa 'ga' zhig kyang yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: don dam par 'brel pa 'ga' zhig kyang yod pa ma yin no //
translated: But ultimately, there is no connection whatsoever.

original: sbyor ba ni gang zhig gang gis cung zad kyang byar med pa'am /
analyzed: sbyor ba ni gang zhig gang gis cung zad kyang byar med pa'am /
translated: The application is this: Whatever is not to be done in the least by something,

original: grub pa gang yin pa de ni de la ltos par mi 'gyur ba'am /
analyzed: grub pa gang yin pa de ni de la ltos par mi 'gyur ba'am /
translated: or whatever is already established, does not depend on that.

original: de dngos su gzhan gyi dbang ma yin te /
analyzed: de dngos su gzhan gyi dbang ma yin te /
translated: Or, that is not actually dependent on another,

original: dper na 'bigs byed dang gangs can la ltos pa'am /
analyzed: dper na 'bigs byed dang gangs can la ltos pa'am /
translated: for example, like the Vindhya and Himalaya mountains.

original: de gzhan gyi dbang ma yin pa lta bu'o //
analyzed: de gzhan gyi dbang ma yin pa lta bu'o //
translated: Or, that is not dependent on another.

original: 'bras bu'i dngos po yang phyis cung zad kyang byar med pa'am /
analyzed: 'bras bu'i dngos po yang phyis cung zad kyang byar med pa'am /
translated: And the effect is not to be done in the least later,

original: grub zin pa yin no zhes bya ba ni khyab par byed pa mi dmigs pa'o //
analyzed: grub zin pa yin no zhes bya ba ni khyab par byed pa mi dmigs pa'o //
translated: or it is already established. This is the non-observation of a pervader.

original: bsgrub par bya ba gnyis pa la ltos nas khyab par byed pa 'gal ba dmigs pa'o //üîΩde de ltar na 'bras bu la yang don dam pa'i 'brel pa yod pa ma yin na /
analyzed: bsgrub par bya ba gnyis pa la ltos nas khyab par byed pa 'gal ba dmigs pa'o // de de ltar na 'bras bu la yang don dam pa'i 'brel pa yod pa ma yin na /
translated: With regard to the second probandum, there is the observation of a contradictory pervaded object.üîΩIf it is like that, then if the effect does not have a relation in reality,

original: ji ltar yang ste rnam pa ji ltar spyi 'bras bu ma yin pa gang yin pa de la don dam pa'i 'bras bu ji ltar yod par 'gyur /
analyzed: ji ltar yang ste rnam pa ji ltar spyi 'bras bu ma yin pa gang yin pa de la don dam pa'i 'bras bu ji ltar yod par 'gyur /
translated: how could it be that the non-effect, in whatever way, has an effect in reality?

original: de bas na gzhan nyid yin na don gzhan nyid yin na'o //
analyzed: de bas na gzhan nyid yin na don gzhan nyid yin na'o //
translated: Therefore, if they are different, they are different objects.

original: gang las she na /
analyzed: gang las she na /
translated: From what?

original: gsal ba las so //
analyzed: gsal ba las so //
translated: From the particulars.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /üîΩspyi de 'brel @135a * //
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na / spyi de 'brel @135a * //
translated: Why?

original: med gsal ba dang ngo //üîΩsbyor ba ni gang zhig gang gis rang bzhin phul du byung ba cung zad kyang byar med pa de ni de la rag lus pa'am /
analyzed: med gsal ba dang ngo // sbyor ba ni gang zhig gang gis rang bzhin phul du byung ba cung zad kyang byar med pa de ni de la rag lus pa'am /
translated: Because the universal is not related to the particulars.üîΩThe syllogism is as follows:

original: de dang 'brel par rigs pa ma yin te /
analyzed: de dang 'brel par rigs pa ma yin te /
translated: That which does not in the least contribute to the excellence of the nature of another cannot be related to it or dependent on it,

original: dper na gzhan 'ga' zhag gang dang yang 'brel ba med pa lta bu'o //
analyzed: dper na gzhan 'ga' zhag gang dang yang 'brel ba med pa lta bu'o //
translated: like some other thing which is unrelated to it.üîΩAnd the universal does not in the least contribute to the excellence of the nature of the particulars.

original: spyi yang gsal bas rang bzhin phul du byung ba cung zad kyang byar med do zhes bya ba ni khyab par byed pa mi dmigs pa'o //
analyzed: spyi yang gsal bas rang bzhin phul du byung ba cung zad kyang byar med do zhes bya ba ni khyab par byed pa mi dmigs pa'o //
translated: This is an argument by the non-apprehension of a wider sphere.

original: de phyir rang bzhin med par grub /
analyzed: de phyir rang bzhin med par grub /
translated: Therefore, it is established that it has no intrinsic nature.

original: gang gis gzugs la sogs pa las tha dad pa dang tha dad med pa dag tu rigs kyi rang gi ngo bo rnam par gzhag pa mi nus pa de'i phyir de rang bzhin med pa nyid yin no //
analyzed: gang gis gzugs la sogs pa las tha dad pa dang tha dad med pa dag tu rigs kyi rang gi ngo bo rnam par gzhag pa mi nus pa de'i phyir de rang bzhin med pa nyid yin no //
translated: Since it is not possible to posit the intrinsic reality of the universal either as different or non-different from form, etc., therefore it has no intrinsic nature.

original: sbyor ba ni gang gzugs la sogs pa la tha dad pa dang / tha dad pa med pa dag tu rnam par gzhag par bya ba'i rang bzhin du mi 'gyur ba de ni rang bzhin med pa yin te /
analyzed: sbyor ba ni gang gzugs la sogs pa la tha dad pa dang / tha dad pa med pa dag tu rnam par gzhag par bya ba'i rang bzhin du mi 'gyur ba de ni rang bzhin med pa yin te /
translated: The application is this: that which is not suitable to be posited as different or not different from form and so on does not have intrinsic nature.

original: dper na mo gsham gyi bu lta bu'o //
analyzed: dper na mo gsham gyi bu lta bu'o //
translated: For example, it is like the son of a barren woman.

original: spyi dang gzugs la sogs pa las tha dad pa dang / tha dad pa med pa dag tu rnam par gzhag par bya ba'i rang bzhin du mi 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni khyab par byed pa mi dmigs pa'o //
analyzed: spyi dang gzugs la sogs pa las tha dad pa dang / tha dad pa med pa dag tu rnam par gzhag par bya ba'i rang bzhin du mi 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni khyab par byed pa mi dmigs pa'o //
translated: The pervasion is that it is not suitable to be posited as different or not different from universals and instances such as form.

original: gal te dngos po las rigs de nyid dang gzhan nyid du rnam par gzhag pa mi nus pa'i ngo bo yin no zhes bya ba ni rang bzhin med pa yin la /
analyzed: gal te dngos po las rigs de nyid dang gzhan nyid du rnam par gzhag pa mi nus pa'i ngo bo yin no zhes bya ba ni rang bzhin med pa yin la /
translated: If you say that that type is not able to be posited as the same as or different from things, it is a nonexistent entity.

original: rigs de yang de dang 'dra ba yin par brjod pa de'i tshe /
analyzed: rigs de yang de dang 'dra ba yin par brjod pa de'i tshe /
translated: And that type is said to be similar to that.

original: med pa ri bong gi rva la sogs pa yang dngos po las de nyid dang gzhan nyid du brjod par bya ba nyid ma yin pa'i phyir /
analyzed: med pa ri bong gi rva la sogs pa yang dngos po las de nyid dang gzhan nyid du brjod par bya ba nyid ma yin pa'i phyir /
translated: At that time, nonexistent things such as the horns of a rabbit are not to be expressed as the same as or different from things.

original: rang bzhin med pa nyid yin pa de bas na /
analyzed: rang bzhin med pa nyid yin pa de bas na /
translated: Since it is essenceless,

original: rigs su thal bar 'gyur te /
analyzed: rigs su thal bar 'gyur te /
translated: it follows that it is a universal.

original: de yang spyir 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de yang spyir 'gyur ro //
translated: And that is a general characteristic.

original: kho bo cag ni gang dang gang rang bzhin med pa de thams cad ni spyi yin no zhes mi smra ba de ltar na gang gis med par rigs su thal bar 'gyur /
analyzed: kho bo cag ni gang dang gang rang bzhin med pa de thams cad ni spyi yin no zhes mi smra ba de ltar na gang gis med par rigs su thal bar 'gyur /
translated: We do not say that whatever is essenceless is a universal, so how could it follow that it is a universal?

original: 'on ci yin zhe na /
analyzed: 'on ci yin zhe na /
translated: Well then, what is it?

original: rigs ni dngos po'i rang bzhin du yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: rigs ni dngos po'i rang bzhin du yod pa ma yin no //
translated: A universal does not exist as the essence of a thing.

original: 'o na gal te rigs rang bzhin med pa de'i tshe rang bzhin med pa de nyid kyi phyir 'ba' zhig kyang spyir mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: 'o na gal te rigs rang bzhin med pa de'i tshe rang bzhin med pa de nyid kyi phyir 'ba' zhig kyang spyir mi 'gyur te /
translated: But if a universal is essenceless, then because it is essenceless, it is not a universal,

original: ri bong gi rva la sogs pa bzhin no zhe na /
analyzed: ri bong gi rva la sogs pa bzhin no zhe na /
translated: just like the horn of a donkey.

original: de la 'dir gal te spyi dngos por gyur pa gcig cig rjes su 'gro ba'i ngang tshul can du mi 'gyur ro zhes brjod pa de'i grub pa la sgrub pa nyid yin no //
analyzed: de la 'dir gal te spyi dngos por gyur pa gcig cig rjes su 'gro ba'i ngang tshul can du mi 'gyur ro zhes brjod pa de'i grub pa la sgrub pa nyid yin no //
translated: Here, if you say that a single universal that exists as a thing does not have the character of being a universal, then that is a proof of its establishment.

original: ci ste yang tha dad pa med pa'i rnam pa'i rnam pa can gyi shes @135b pa'i yul du mi 'gyur ro zhes brjod pa de'i tshe /
analyzed: ci ste yang tha dad pa med pa'i rnam pa'i rnam pa can gyi shes @135b pa'i yul du mi 'gyur ro zhes brjod pa de'i tshe /
translated: But if you say that the non-difference of the aspects is not the object of a consciousness that has aspects,

original: ma nges pa yin no //
analyzed: ma nges pa yin no //
translated: then your statement is not certain.

original: 'di ltar rta ma yin pa nyid ni ba lang la sogs pa rnam pa gcig pa can gyi shes ba'i yul yin zhing /
analyzed: 'di ltar rta ma yin pa nyid ni ba lang la sogs pa rnam pa gcig pa can gyi shes ba'i yul yin zhing /
translated: For the non-horseness of a horse is the object of a consciousness that has the same aspect as a cow, etc.

original: tshig gi don drug tshig gi don nyid yin pa dang / snga na med pa la sogs pa med pa nyid yin no zhes bya ba de lta bu la sogs pa'i rnam pa du ma 'dra ba'i shes pa'i yul yin no //
analyzed: tshig gi don drug tshig gi don nyid yin pa dang / snga na med pa la sogs pa med pa nyid yin no zhes bya ba de lta bu la sogs pa'i rnam pa du ma 'dra ba'i shes pa'i yul yin no //
translated: And the non-existence of the six categories, the meaning of the words, and the non-existence of the non-existent, etc., are the objects of a consciousness that has many similar aspects.

original: de la dngos por gyur pa gcig rjes su 'gro ba'i ngang tshul du yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: de la dngos por gyur pa gcig rjes su 'gro ba'i ngang tshul du yod pa ma yin no //
translated: And in that case, there is no single entity that has the nature of being a universal.

original: gang yang ri bong gi rva la sogs pa med pa yin na yang /
analyzed: gang yang ri bong gi rva la sogs pa med pa yin na yang /
translated: And even though the non-existence of the rabbit‚Äôs horns, etc.,

original: bum pa la sogs pa spyi min /
analyzed: bum pa la sogs pa spyi min /
translated: is not a universal,

original: bum pa la sogs pa de la de ltos med phyir ro //
analyzed: bum pa la sogs pa de la de ltos med phyir ro //
translated: because it does not depend on a pot, etc.

original: bum pa dang ri bong gi rva la sogs pa dag la phan tshun chos dang chos can gyi dngos po yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: bum pa dang ri bong gi rva la sogs pa dag la phan tshun chos dang chos can gyi dngos po yod pa ma yin no //
translated: But in the case of a pot and a rabbit‚Äôs horns, etc., there is no mutual relation of property and possessor.

original: bum pa dang de'i spyi la ltos pa yod pa gang yin pa de la ni bum pa chos can dang bum pa nyid chos yin no zhes bya ba ni rigs pa yin no //
analyzed: bum pa dang de'i spyi la ltos pa yod pa gang yin pa de la ni bum pa chos can dang bum pa nyid chos yin no zhes bya ba ni rigs pa yin no //
translated: But in the case of a pot and its universal, where there is a relation of dependence, it is correct to say that the pot is the property-possessor and its potness is the property.

original: gal te 'di la yang ji ltar chos dang chos can gyi dngos por 'gyur zhe na /
analyzed: gal te 'di la yang ji ltar chos dang chos can gyi dngos por 'gyur zhe na /
translated: But how can there be a relation of property and possessor in this case?

original: bden te 'on kyang phyi rol gyi don dang de las ldog pa yin no zhes de mthong ba la brten nas /
analyzed: bden te 'on kyang phyi rol gyi don dang de las ldog pa yin no zhes de mthong ba la brten nas /
translated: True, but it is a case of external objects and their negation.

original: rnam par rtog pa'i blo chos du ma la zhen pa can rang bzhin gyis 'khrul bar byung ba rang gi snang ba la gnas pa chos tha dad pa de dang de dngos po'i chos bzhin du 'jog par byed do //
analyzed: rnam par rtog pa'i blo chos du ma la zhen pa can rang bzhin gyis 'khrul bar byung ba rang gi snang ba la gnas pa chos tha dad pa de dang de dngos po'i chos bzhin du 'jog par byed do //
translated: On the basis of seeing that, the conceptual mind, which is naturally mistaken and attached to many phenomena, arises and posits this and that as different phenomena, as if they were real phenomena.

original: de'i snang ba'i stobs kyis chos sam chos can zhes bya ba'i tha snyad 'di byed pa de bas na de dag la ltos pa yod pa yin no //
analyzed: de'i snang ba'i stobs kyis chos sam chos can zhes bya ba'i tha snyad 'di byed pa de bas na de dag la ltos pa yod pa yin no //
translated: The convention ‚Äúproperty‚Äù or ‚Äúsubject‚Äù is made on the strength of its appearance. Therefore, they are dependent.

original: bum pa dang ri bong gi rva dag la ni de 'dra ba'i ltos pa de yang yod pa ma yin pa de ltar na bum pa chos can ma yin zhing med pa yang de'i spyi ma yin no //
analyzed: bum pa dang ri bong gi rva dag la ni de 'dra ba'i ltos pa de yang yod pa ma yin pa de ltar na bum pa chos can ma yin zhing med pa yang de'i spyi ma yin no //
translated: But a pot and a rabbit‚Äôs horns do not have such dependence. Thus, a pot is not a subject, and a non-existent is not its universal.

original: gang gi phyir de ltar rigs rang bzhin med par bstan pa de'i phyir ngo bo med pa ste /
analyzed: gang gi phyir de ltar rigs rang bzhin med par bstan pa de'i phyir ngo bo med pa ste /
translated: Since it has been shown in this way that a property is essenceless, therefore, it is essenceless.

original: rigs rang bzhin med pa yin no //
analyzed: rigs rang bzhin med pa yin no //
translated: A property is essenceless.

original: 'on kyang ngo bo ste /
analyzed: 'on kyang ngo bo ste /
translated: However, it is a property.

original: rang bzhin rnams la brten nas /
analyzed: rang bzhin rnams la brten nas /
translated: It is imputed as a property in dependence on essences.üîΩAlthough it is a different essence in dependence on the different things from which it is distinguished,

original: dngos po gang dang gang las ldog pa de dang de las tha dad pa la brten nas rang bzhin tha dad du zin kyang /
analyzed: dngos po gang dang gang las ldog pa de dang de las tha dad pa la brten nas rang bzhin tha dad du zin kyang /
translated: it is imputed as a property in dependence on those things.

original: tha snyad kyi don du /
analyzed: tha snyad kyi don du /
translated: In order to designate it conventionally,

original: ngo bo med la rigs brtags pa //
analyzed: ngo bo med la rigs brtags pa //
translated: the property is imputed as essenceless.

original: sgra rnams kyis ni rab tu bstan /
analyzed: sgra rnams kyis ni rab tu bstan /
translated: It is indicated by words.

original: ci 'dra ba zhig ce na /
analyzed: ci 'dra ba zhig ce na /
translated: What is it like?

original: khyad par de la 'jug don can //
analyzed: khyad par de la 'jug don can //
translated: and the particular is the object of the engagement of that.

original: de yang de yin la khyad par yang yin pa de bas na khyad par de la'o //
analyzed: de yang de yin la khyad par yang yin pa de bas na khyad par de la'o //
translated: And that is the particular, therefore, of that particular.

original: de dang de rnam par gcad par shes @136a * //
analyzed: de dang de rnam par gcad par shes @136a * //
translated: In order to understand the exclusion of that and that,

original: par bya ba'i phyir brdar byas pa can dag gis so //
analyzed: par bya ba'i phyir brdar byas pa can dag gis so //
translated: by those who have made the convention.

original: rigs de de'i ngo bor snang ba'am /
analyzed: rigs de de'i ngo bor snang ba'am /
translated: That is the nature of that, or

original: ngo bo gang cung zad bzhin du snang ba zhes brjod pa gang yin pa'am /
analyzed: ngo bo gang cung zad bzhin du snang ba zhes brjod pa gang yin pa'am /
translated: that which is said to appear as a nature of some kind.

original: don la de nyid du 'dzin pa rigs kyi /
analyzed: don la de nyid du 'dzin pa rigs kyi /
translated: It is proper to apprehend the object as that itself,

original: ngo bo snang ba'i sgo nas phyi rol gyi don la gcig nyid du mngon par zhen pa gang de 'khrul pa yin no //
analyzed: ngo bo snang ba'i sgo nas phyi rol gyi don la gcig nyid du mngon par zhen pa gang de 'khrul pa yin no //
translated: but the adherence to the external object as one by way of the appearance of a nature is an error.

original: ci 'dra ba zhig ce na /
analyzed: ci 'dra ba zhig ce na /
translated: What kind of error?

original: thog ma med pa'i dus can mthong goms sprul pa nyid /
analyzed: thog ma med pa'i dus can mthong goms sprul pa nyid /
translated: It is the creation of the habit of seeing from beginningless time.

original: thog ma med pa'i dus can phan tshun tha dad par 'dzin pa'i ngang tshul can mthong ba goms pa des gzhan pa gang yin pa de ni 'khrul pa yin no zhes bya ba'i tha snyad 'di ni log pa'i don can yin no //
analyzed: thog ma med pa'i dus can phan tshun tha dad par 'dzin pa'i ngang tshul can mthong ba goms pa des gzhan pa gang yin pa de ni 'khrul pa yin no zhes bya ba'i tha snyad 'di ni log pa'i don can yin no //
translated: The expression ‚Äúwhatever is different from that is mistaken‚Äù is meaningless.

original: gzhan sel ba'i mtshan nyid can gyi spyi de rnam par gzhag pa gang yin pa de yang spyi'i ngo bo med pa nyid yin no zhes bstan pa'i phyir /
analyzed: gzhan sel ba'i mtshan nyid can gyi spyi de rnam par gzhag pa gang yin pa de yang spyi'i ngo bo med pa nyid yin no zhes bstan pa'i phyir /
translated: In order to demonstrate that the universal, which is defined as the exclusion of other, is itself devoid of any universal nature, [NƒÅgƒÅrjuna] states:

original: don rnams kyi ni gcig la sogs pas gzhan la ldog pa rnams kyi spyi gang yin pa gzhan las ldog pa'i mtshan nyid can /
analyzed: don rnams kyi ni gcig la sogs pas gzhan la ldog pa rnams kyi spyi gang yin pa gzhan las ldog pa'i mtshan nyid can /
translated: The universal that is the opposite of other with regard to the singularity and so on of things

original: gzhan sel ba'i ngo bo rnam par gzhag pa nyid yin no //
analyzed: gzhan sel ba'i ngo bo rnam par gzhag pa nyid yin no //
translated: is defined as the exclusion of other.

original: sgra de 'dis ni gang nges can /
analyzed: sgra de 'dis ni gang nges can /
translated: The sound that is ascertained by this

original: mi 'dod pa spong ba'i sgo nas 'jug pa'i phyir de la de las gzhan pa rnam par gcod pa na sgra tha snyad du byed pa dag gis tha dad pa de dang de shes par bya ba'i phyir /
analyzed: mi 'dod pa spong ba'i sgo nas 'jug pa'i phyir de la de las gzhan pa rnam par gcod pa na sgra tha snyad du byed pa dag gis tha dad pa de dang de shes par bya ba'i phyir /
translated: Because it engages by way of abandoning the undesirable, when it is distinguished from that, in order to understand that and that distinction,

original: rjod par byed pa rab tu sbyor ba yin no //
analyzed: rjod par byed pa rab tu sbyor ba yin no //
translated: those who use language apply expressions.

original: gzhan sel ba de'i ngo bo cir mi rung /
analyzed: gzhan sel ba de'i ngo bo cir mi rung /
translated: What is the nature of that exclusion of other?

original: rang bzhin cung zad kyang yod pa ma yin ni //
analyzed: rang bzhin cung zad kyang yod pa ma yin ni //
translated: It does not have any nature at all.

original: gang yang spyi'i blo la /
analyzed: gang yang spyi'i blo la /
translated: Also, with regard to the cognition of the universal,üîΩit arises in dependence on objects that are mutually different, but it apprehends them as undifferentiated, conforming to its own appearance.

original: don 'khrul pa phan tshun tha dad pa'i don la brten nas skyes par gyur pa de nyid rang gi snang ba'i rjes su byed pas tha dad pa med pa bzhin du 'dzin pa na ngo bo gcig pa don gyi rnam pa can rjes su 'gro ba 'khrul pa'i
analyzed: don 'khrul pa phan tshun tha dad pa'i don la brten nas skyes par gyur pa de nyid rang gi snang ba'i rjes su byed pas tha dad pa med pa bzhin du 'dzin pa na ngo bo gcig pa don gyi rnam pa can rjes su 'gro ba 'khrul pa'i
translated: The nature of the mistaken cognition that has the aspect of the object isüîΩone entity.

original: ngo bo'o // ci 'dra ba zhig ce na /
analyzed: ngo bo'o // ci 'dra ba zhig ce na /
translated: What is it like?

original: ngo bo med can la ste /
analyzed: ngo bo med can la ste /
translated: It is without entityness.

original: ji ltar snang bar gyur pa'i rnam pas rang bzhin med pa yin du zin kyang de'i don du 'khrul pa ste /
analyzed: ji ltar snang bar gyur pa'i rnam pas rang bzhin med pa yin du zin kyang de'i don du 'khrul pa ste /
translated: Although it is without any nature, it is mistaken with regard to its object, in accordance with the aspect that appears.

original: de'i don gyi rnam pa can de /
analyzed: de'i don gyi rnam pa can de /
translated: We do accept that the form of that is a universal.

original: spyi yin par kho bo cag 'dod par gyur na /
analyzed: spyi yin par kho bo cag 'dod par gyur na /
translated: But it is not reasonable that

original: 'di ltar 'khrul pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis brdzun pa nyid yin pa'i phyir /üîΩde yang rigs pa ma yin no //
analyzed: 'di ltar 'khrul pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis brdzun pa nyid yin pa'i phyir / de yang rigs pa ma yin no //
translated: it is a universal, because it is false by virtue of being an error.

original: 'khrul pa nyid gang las yin zhe na /
analyzed: 'khrul pa nyid gang las yin zhe na /
translated: From what error does it arise?

original: spyi nyid du yang mthong phyir ro //
analyzed: spyi nyid du yang mthong phyir ro //
translated: Because it is seen as a universal.

original: tha dad pa med par don tha dad pa dag tu yang so sor snang ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: tha dad pa med par don tha dad pa dag tu yang so sor snang ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it appears as individual things without being different.

original: de nyid kyi phyir don gyi rnam pa can de la don du 'khrul pa @136b zhes bshad pa yin no //
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir don gyi rnam pa can de la don du 'khrul pa @136b zhes bshad pa yin no //
translated: Therefore, it is explained that it is an error in regard to the object that has the form of the object.

original: gzhan yang spyi'i blo ni ngo bo can min te /
analyzed: gzhan yang spyi'i blo ni ngo bo can min te /
translated: Moreover, the cognition of a universal does not have a nature,

original: rang bzhin med pa'o //üîΩci'i phyir zhe na bslad phyir dang / de'i ngo bo de ma yin te /
analyzed: rang bzhin med pa'o // ci'i phyir zhe na bslad phyir dang / de'i ngo bo de ma yin te /
translated: because it is essenceless.üîΩWhy? Because it is adulterated.

original: de lta bu'i ngo bor brtags pa'i rten ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de lta bu'i ngo bor brtags pa'i rten ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Its nature is not that, because it is not the basis of the imputation of such a nature.

original: don dngos de nyid med phyir ro //
analyzed: don dngos de nyid med phyir ro //
translated: Because the actual object does not exist.

original: ji ltar de'i ngo bo nyid kyis 'khrul pa yin pa'i phyir rang gi snang ba'i don med du zin kyang don du zhen pa de ltar na de nyid de bden pa'i don gyi rang gi ngo bo nyid du mi 'gyur ba'i phyir yang rang bzhin med pa yin
analyzed: ji ltar de'i ngo bo nyid kyis 'khrul pa yin pa'i phyir rang gi snang ba'i don med du zin kyang don du zhen pa de ltar na de nyid de bden pa'i don gyi rang gi ngo bo nyid du mi 'gyur ba'i phyir yang rang bzhin med pa yin
translated: Because it is mistaken by way of its own entity, even though the object that appears to it does not exist, it is just as if it were conceived to be an object. In that case, it would not be the entity of a real object. Therefore, it is also essenceless.

original: no // de de ltar na gzhan las ldog pa'i ngo bo spyi yin nam /
analyzed: no // de de ltar na gzhan las ldog pa'i ngo bo spyi yin nam /
translated: In that case, is it a universal that is the opposite of another?

original: blo'i snang ba spyir 'dod pa gang yin pa de ni gnyis ka yang don dam par ngo bo cung zad kyang yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: blo'i snang ba spyir 'dod pa gang yin pa de ni gnyis ka yang don dam par ngo bo cung zad kyang yod pa ma yin no //
translated: Or is it asserted to be a universal that is the appearance in the mind? In either case, in reality it does not exist in the least.

original: de nyid kyi phyir spyi de /
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir spyi de /
translated: For that very reason, that universal

original: ngo bo med pas brjod bya min //
analyzed: ngo bo med pas brjod bya min //
translated: Is inexpressible because it has no entity.

original: dngos po las de nyid dang gzhan nyid du'o //
analyzed: dngos po las de nyid dang gzhan nyid du'o //
translated: It is neither the same nor different from things.

original: gang la ngo bo cung zad kyang yod pa ma yin pa de'i dngos po la brten pa de nyid dang gzhan nyid kyi tha snyad gang las yin /
analyzed: gang la ngo bo cung zad kyang yod pa ma yin pa de'i dngos po la brten pa de nyid dang gzhan nyid kyi tha snyad gang las yin /
translated: How could that which has not the slightest entity be the basis of the conventions of same and different?

original: ngo bo nyid dang ldan pa yin na ni /
analyzed: ngo bo nyid dang ldan pa yin na ni /
translated: If it had an entity,

original: de nyid dang gzhan nyid las 'das pa ma yin no //
analyzed: de nyid dang gzhan nyid las 'das pa ma yin no //
translated: It is not beyond being the same or different.

original: de ltar 'gyur mod kyi /üîΩgal te tshig 'ba' zhig las kyang /
analyzed: de ltar 'gyur mod kyi / gal te tshig 'ba' zhig las kyang /
translated: This is so,

original: dngos 'dod na ni /
analyzed: dngos 'dod na ni /
translated: but if you assert that a thing is from mere words,üîΩthen

original: bum pa'i spyi rang gi nye bar len par 'gyur ba gzugs la sogs pa dag las de nyid dang gzhan nyid du brjod par bya ba ma yin na yang /
analyzed: bum pa'i spyi rang gi nye bar len par 'gyur ba gzugs la sogs pa dag las de nyid dang gzhan nyid du brjod par bya ba ma yin na yang /
translated: even though the universal of pot is not to be expressed as the same or different from its appropriated parts, such as form,

original: snam bu las bum pa tha dad pa yin no //
analyzed: snam bu las bum pa tha dad pa yin no //
translated: the pot is different from the cloth.

original: snam bu las bum pa gzhan nyid du brjod par bya ba nyid yin pa de ltar na /
analyzed: snam bu las bum pa gzhan nyid du brjod par bya ba nyid yin pa de ltar na /
translated: Just as the pot is to be expressed as different from the cloth,

original: spyi dngos po las de nyid dang gzhan nyid du brjod par bya ba yin pas na /
analyzed: spyi dngos po las de nyid dang gzhan nyid du brjod par bya ba yin pas na /
translated: in the same way, the universal is to be expressed as the same or different from the thing.

original: brjod par bya ba nyid ma yin pa'i phyir zhes bya ba'i gtan tshigs ma grub pa nyid yin no //
analyzed: brjod par bya ba nyid ma yin pa'i phyir zhes bya ba'i gtan tshigs ma grub pa nyid yin no //
translated: Therefore the reason, ‚Äúbecause it is not to be expressed,‚Äù is not established.

original: de bas na brjod par bya ba nyid yin pa'i phyir spyi dngos po yin no zhe na dngos po rnams zhes bya ba la sogs pas ma grub pa'i lan 'debs par byed do //
analyzed: de bas na brjod par bya ba nyid yin pa'i phyir spyi dngos po yin no zhe na dngos po rnams zhes bya ba la sogs pas ma grub pa'i lan 'debs par byed do //
translated: Thus if you say that the universal is a thing because it is to be expressed, then in response to that, the line ‚ÄúThings are not to be expressed‚Äù and so on is stated.

original: gal te yang bum pa zhes bya ba'i tshogs pa snam bu zhes bya ba'i dngos po las gzhan nyid du brjod par bya ba yin pa de ltar na yang /
analyzed: gal te yang bum pa zhes bya ba'i tshogs pa snam bu zhes bya ba'i dngos po las gzhan nyid du brjod par bya ba yin pa de ltar na yang /
translated: If the collection called ‚Äúpot‚Äù is said to be different from the thing called ‚Äúcloth,‚Äù

original: rang gi tshogs pa dag las brjod par bya ba nyid ma yin no //
analyzed: rang gi tshogs pa dag las brjod par bya ba nyid ma yin no //
translated: then it is not even expressible in terms of its own collection.

original: brjod par bya ba nyid ma yin pa de yang dngos po nyid ma yin pa'i phyir 'dod do //
analyzed: brjod par bya ba nyid ma yin pa de yang dngos po nyid ma yin pa'i phyir 'dod do //
translated: And that which is not expressible is not a thing, so we accept it.

original: de lta ma yin na de las kyang mi 'gyur na de yod pa yang yin te /
analyzed: de lta ma yin na de las kyang mi 'gyur na de yod pa yang yin te /
translated: If it were not so, then it would not be different from that, and it would exist,

original: rang bzhin med pa nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rang bzhin med pa nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it would be without intrinsic reality.

original: dngos po rnams rnam 'gas brjod bya nyid ma yin @137a * //
analyzed: dngos po rnams rnam 'gas brjod bya nyid ma yin @137a * //
translated: In what way are things not expressible?

original: dngos po'i rang bzhin ba 'ga' zhig las kyang brjod par bya ba nyid ma yin pa med de /
analyzed: dngos po'i rang bzhin ba 'ga' zhig las kyang brjod par bya ba nyid ma yin pa med de /
translated: There is nothing that is not expressible in terms of some nature of a thing,

original: de nyid dang gzhan gyi rnam par rtog pa las ma 'das pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de nyid dang gzhan gyi rnam par rtog pa las ma 'das pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it does not transcend the concepts of identity and difference.

original: de bas na gtan tshigs 'di ni khyab par bcas pa yin te /
analyzed: de bas na gtan tshigs 'di ni khyab par bcas pa yin te /
translated: Therefore, this reason is established as universal.

original: ji ltar dngos po 'ga' zhig las kyang brjod par bya ba ma yin pa gang yin pa de ni dngos po ma yin pa de ltar na ma grub pa ma yin no //
analyzed: ji ltar dngos po 'ga' zhig las kyang brjod par bya ba ma yin pa gang yin pa de ni dngos po ma yin pa de ltar na ma grub pa ma yin no //
translated: Just as something is not a thing if it is not expressible as anything at all, so it is not the case that the reason is not established.

original: yang na gtan tshigs khyad par med pas kyang ma grub ma yin te /
analyzed: yang na gtan tshigs khyad par med pas kyang ma grub ma yin te /
translated: Or else, the reason is not not established because it is not differentiated,

original: 'di ltar snam bu las kyang bum pa nyid gzhan nyid du brjod bya min /
analyzed: 'di ltar snam bu las kyang bum pa nyid gzhan nyid du brjod bya min /
translated: because a pot is not expressible as different from a cloth.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: nyer len tha dad pas tha dad //
analyzed: nyer len tha dad pas tha dad //
translated: Because of the difference in appropriated aggregates.

original: nye bar brtags phyir te /üîΩde la bum pa'i nye bar len par 'gyur ba gzugs la sogs pa dngos por yod pa gang yin pa de dag snam bu'i nye bar len pa dngos por yod pa dag las dngos su tha dad pa der gtogs pa'i tha dad pa de dang de'i nye bar
analyzed: nye bar brtags phyir te / de la bum pa'i nye bar len par 'gyur ba gzugs la sogs pa dngos por yod pa gang yin pa de dag snam bu'i nye bar len pa dngos por yod pa dag las dngos su tha dad pa der gtogs pa'i tha dad pa de dang de'i nye bar
translated: Because of imputation.

original: len pa'i sgo nas btags pa'i bum pa dang snam bu dag la yang nye bar btags pa yin pa de ltar na tha dad par brjod do //
analyzed: len pa'i sgo nas btags pa'i bum pa dang snam bu dag la yang nye bar btags pa yin pa de ltar na tha dad par brjod do //
translated: In that regard, the pot‚Äôs appropriated aggregates, such as form, that exist as things are directly different from the cloth‚Äôs appropriated aggregates that exist as things. That difference is the difference belonging to them. The pot and cloth that are imputed in terms of their appropriated aggregates are also imputed in terms of that difference. Thus they are expressed as different.

original: bum pa nyid la sogs pa de dngos su yod pa yang ma yin na gang gis na de 'ga' zhig las gzhan nyid dam gzhan nyid ma yin par brjod par bya bar 'gyur /
analyzed: bum pa nyid la sogs pa de dngos su yod pa yang ma yin na gang gis na de 'ga' zhig las gzhan nyid dam gzhan nyid ma yin par brjod par bya bar 'gyur /
translated: If the pot itself and so on do not exist in reality, then how could it be said that it is different or not different from something else?üîΩMoreover,

original: gzhan yang / 'das pa dang ni ma 'ongs pa'i //üîΩdon la'ang spyi yi rgyu can gyi //üîΩspyi'i rten can nyid kyis mnyam pa dag ste /
analyzed: gzhan yang / 'das pa dang ni ma 'ongs pa'i // don la'ang spyi yi rgyu can gyi // spyi'i rten can nyid kyis mnyam pa dag ste /
translated: with regard to past and futureüîΩobjects,

original: sgra dag 'jug 'gyur na 'god par 'gyur te /
analyzed: sgra dag 'jug 'gyur na 'god par 'gyur te /
translated: the terms are applied because they are equal in having a universal as their basis.

original: dper na bum par gyur pa dang / bum par 'gyur ba zhes bya ba lta bu'o //
analyzed: dper na bum par gyur pa dang / bum par 'gyur ba zhes bya ba lta bu'o //
translated: For example, the terms ‚Äúthe pot that was‚Äù and ‚Äúthe pot that will be‚Äù are applied.

original: de la gal te spyi dngos por gyur ba rten nyid yin pa'i sgo nas sgra rnams 'jug par 'gyur ba de'i tshe /üîΩ'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa'i bum pa de ni dngos po med pa nyid yin pa'i phyir /
analyzed: de la gal te spyi dngos por gyur ba rten nyid yin pa'i sgo nas sgra rnams 'jug par 'gyur ba de'i tshe / 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa'i bum pa de ni dngos po med pa nyid yin pa'i phyir /
translated: If the terms are applied because the universal is the basis of the terms,üîΩthen the past and future pot would not exist,

original: yod pa ste /
analyzed: yod pa ste /
translated: because they are not entities.

original: spyi dngos por gyur pa zhes bya ba 'di ni gtan tshigs yin no //üîΩmed chos ji ltar 'gyur te /
analyzed: spyi dngos por gyur pa zhes bya ba 'di ni gtan tshigs yin no // med chos ji ltar 'gyur te /
translated: This is the argument.

original: mi 'gyur pa nyid do //
analyzed: mi 'gyur pa nyid do //
translated: How could a nonexistent be a phenomenon?üîΩIt could not!

original: dngos po med pa'i 'das pa la sogs pa'i chos mi rung ngo zhes bya ba 'di ni tshad ma'i 'bras bu yin no //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i 'das pa la sogs pa'i chos mi rung ngo zhes bya ba 'di ni tshad ma'i 'bras bu yin no //
translated: This is the result of a valid cognition.

original: sbyor ba ni gang zhig dngos po yin pa de ni dngos po med pa'i chos can du mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: sbyor ba ni gang zhig dngos po yin pa de ni dngos po med pa'i chos can du mi 'gyur te /
translated: The syllogism is: Whatever is an entity cannot be a nonentity.

original: dper na mig gi rnam par shes pa skyed par byed pa'i rang bzhin can gyi gzugs lta bu'o //
analyzed: dper na mig gi rnam par shes pa skyed par byed pa'i rang bzhin can gyi gzugs lta bu'o //
translated: For example, form, which has the nature of producing eye consciousness.üîΩThe universal is an entity.

original: spyi yang dngos po yin no zhes bya ba ni khyab par byed pa 'gal ba dmigs @137b pa'o //
analyzed: spyi yang dngos po yin no zhes bya ba ni khyab par byed pa 'gal ba dmigs @137b pa'o //
translated: This is the observation of a contradiction with a pervasion.

original: yang na gang zhig dngos po med pa'i chos yin pa de ni dngos por mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: yang na gang zhig dngos po med pa'i chos yin pa de ni dngos por mi 'gyur te /
translated: Or, the syllogism is: Whatever has the quality of nonentity cannot be an entity.

original: dper na med pa bzhi po rnams kyi med pa nyid lta bu'o //
analyzed: dper na med pa bzhi po rnams kyi med pa nyid lta bu'o //
translated: For example, the nonexistence of the four nonexistents.üîΩThe universal that is said to pervade the past and future is a nonentity.

original: spyi 'das pa dang ma 'ongs par 'jug pa can yang dngos po med pa'i chos yin no zhes bya ba ni khyab par byed pa 'gal ba dmigs pa nyid yin no //
analyzed: spyi 'das pa dang ma 'ongs par 'jug pa can yang dngos po med pa'i chos yin no zhes bya ba ni khyab par byed pa 'gal ba dmigs pa nyid yin no //
translated: This is the observation of a contradiction with a pervasion.

original: de ltar ni 'gyur mod kyi //
analyzed: de ltar ni 'gyur mod kyi //
translated: This is true,

original: gal te nyer btags las de 'dod //
analyzed: gal te nyer btags las de 'dod //
translated: but if you accept it only as a designation,

original: da ltar gyi bum pa dang 'dra ba 'das pa la sogs pa'i bum pa la spyi'i rgyu can gyi sgra mi 'jug pa ni bden mod kyi /
analyzed: da ltar gyi bum pa dang 'dra ba 'das pa la sogs pa'i bum pa la spyi'i rgyu can gyi sgra mi 'jug pa ni bden mod kyi /
